page_content: Provides educational materials and modules for teaching informatics in secondary schools.
Discusses new projects for cross-border cooperation focusing on the labor market and bilingualism.
Focuses on a program for job training and integration, particularly for people with limited German language skills.
Discusses the importance of information security and data protection in schools, including risk management and emergency preparedness.
Provides guidelines and resources for local government administrations concerning elections and voting.
Discusses the importance of information security and data protection in schools, including risk management and emergency preparedness.
Introduces E-Tax BL, a new electronic tax filing system, detailing its features and security measures.
Provides support information for E-Tax BL, including hotline numbers and email contacts for technical and tax-related queries.
Provides an online demonstration and information about the new SAP Fiori time management system, including its features and functionalities.
